summary: UI design for a food ordering app inspired by Zomato and Swiggy
architectural_notes: UI design inspired by Zomato and Swiggy food ordering apps
Profile menu implemented as dropdown/sidebar allowing users to edit name, email, phone, manage addresses, and settings
Using Lucide React or Hero Icons for consistent line-art style category iconography
Custom FH logo with circular container and fork detail integrated into header branding
Currency set to INR (₹) for Indian market
Location functionality includes manual address entry and current location detection
Restaurant cards display ratings with total number of raters

existing_features.title: Create a home page with a prominent search bar for restaurants and dishes, featured restaurant cards with images, ratings, and cuisine types, and category filters (e.g., Pizza, Chinese, Fast Food, Desserts)

Design a restaurant detail page showing restaurant banner image, menu items organized by categories, item cards with name, description, price, and add-to-cart button, and restaurant information (rating, reviews, location, opening hours)
Implement a cart sidebar or bottom sheet showing selected items with quantity controls, item prices, subtotal, delivery fee, taxes, and total amount with a checkout button
Create a navigation header with app logo, location selector, search functionality, and cart icon with item count badge

Design a visually cohesive interface using a vibrant, food-focused color scheme with warm accent colors (reds, oranges, or yellows), clean typography suitable for food content, generous use of high-quality food imagery, and card-based layouts with rounded corners and subtle shadows for depth
Add a profile icon button in the navigation header positioned immediately to the left of the cart icon in the top-right corner

Implement a dropdown/sidebar profile menu that appears when clicking the profile icon, containing sections for: profile editing (name, email, phone), address book management, and settings, with a logout option at the bottom
Update the Header component to display the new custom FH logo on the left side, replacing or enhancing the current logo/branding

Replace the category filter icons in the CategoryFilter component with consistent line-art style icons from Lucide React: use Pizza icon for Pizza category, UtensilsCrossed icon for Chinese category, Beef icon for Fast Food category, and IceCream icon for Dessert category

Implement a login/authentication screen that appears when a non-authenticated user clicks the profile icon, prompting them to log in or sign up with messaging like 'Save your preferences to order faster'
Render the generated FH logo image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory in the Header component
Implement working search functionality in the SearchBar component on the HomePage to filter restaurants by name, cuisine, or dish when user types in the search input
Make the CategoryFilter component functional so that clicking a category button filters the displayed restaurants to show only those matching the selected category
Change all price displays throughout the application from USD ($) to INR (₹) including cart items, menu items, price breakdown in cart sidebar, and restaurant cards
Enhance the LocationSelector component to allow users to manually enter a delivery address or use their current browser location for delivery
Expand the restaurant listings on HomePage from 6 to at least 20 restaurants with diverse cuisine types and ratings
Add at least 8 category options in the CategoryFilter component ('What's on your mind' section) including current categories plus new options like Burgers, Biryani, North Indian, South Indian
Implement a 'View All' button in the featured restaurants section on HomePage that opens a full-page scrollable list of all restaurants with a search bar at the top
Update RestaurantCard component to display both the numeric rating and the number of people who have rated the restaurant (e.g., '4.5 (1.2K ratings)')

new_feature_requests.summary: Create UI design for food ordering app (Zomato/Swiggy style)
Add profile icon in header with dropdown menu for profile editing, address book, and settings
Create custom FH logo with circular/rounded container and fork detail in H
Replace category icons with consistent line-art style icons from Lucide React
Implement login/authentication screen for user access
Fix search bar functionality to make it working
Make 'What's on your mind' filter functional for item selection
Change currency from USD to INR for Indian users
Add manual address entry and current location selection for delivery
Expand restaurant listings and add more options in 'What's on your mind' section
Implement 'View All' section with scrollable restaurant list and search bar
Display restaurant ratings with number of people who rated on cards
